timeline.bodyText: lets use base file consistently in new code . not "data file"
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: ok makes sense. I've renamed the APIs. I do left org.apache.hudi.common.fs.FSUtils#makeDataFileName(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) as is since it is out of test scope. Renaming it would probably go to another PR.
replies.author: xushiyan
